org.jgrapes.core.internal

Class EventBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapes.core.internal.EventBuffer

  • public class EventBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
    The event buffer is used before a tree has been started. It simply buffers all events until a Start event is added.
    Author:
    Michael N. Lipp

      • add

        public <T extends Event<?>> T add(T event,
                                  Channel... channels)
        Add an event to be sent to components listening for such events on the given channels to the end of the queue without any checking.
        Parameters:
        event - the event to process
        channels - the channels that the event was fired on
        Returns:
        the event (for easy chaining)
